description: Astilbe 'Red Sentinel' is a stunning plant species, with its unique spire-like shape and vibrant red blooms. It grows fast and thrives in both wet and dry soil types, making it easy to care for with minimal maintenance. This perennial is also great for attracting butterflies and birds and other wildlife to your garden. Its bold and vivid display of foliage and flowers is sure to make an impression in your landscape. Plus, the foliage will stay evergreen in cold climates, giving your garden year round colour and texture. Astilbe 'Red Sentinel' is a low-maintenance beauty that will make your garden stand out.
